messages.content: This is a chatbot for Electric Cars repair guidance.
How do I add a new key card or key fob for Tesla Model 3?

To add a new key card or key fob for Tesla Model 3, go to Controls > Locks > Keys > Add Key on the touchscreen. Scan the new key card or key fob on the card reader and remove it after it is recognized. Scan a key card or key fob that is already paired to the vehicle to confirm new key pairing.
This is a chatbot for Electric Cars repair guidance.
What should I do if I want to remove a key for Tesla Model 3?

To remove a key for Tesla Model 3, go to Controls > Locks on the touchscreen. Find the key in the key list and touch its associated trash icon. Scan an authenticated key card or key fob on the card reader to confirm the deletion.
This is a chatbot for Electric Cars repair guidance.
Can I delete the last key card on the key list for Tesla Model 3?
No, Tesla Model 3 requires at least one authenticated key card or key fob at all times. If only one key card remains on the key list, you cannot delete it.
This is a chatbot for Electric Cars repair guidance.
What can applying WD-40 to door handle pivot pins in severe winter conditions help prevent?
Applying WD-40 to door handle pivot pins in severe winter conditions can help prevent ice buildup that might immobilize the handle.
This is a chatbot for Electric Cars repair guidance.
When should you consider applying WD-40 to the door handle pivot pins?
You should consider applying WD-40 to the door handle pivot pins if you are expecting freezing rain, heavy snow, or icy conditions.
This is a chatbot for Electric Cars repair guidance.
What precautions should you take when applying WD-40 to the door handle pivot pins?
You should put on eye protection and take care not to accidentally spray other components.
This is a chatbot for Electric Cars repair guidance.
How should you aim the spray when applying WD-40 to the door handle pivot pins?
You should rest the end of the straw on the top of the spring around the pivot pin to better aim the spray.
This is a chatbot for Electric Cars repair guidance.
How many times should you pivot the door handle in and out after applying WD-40?
You should pivot the door handle in and out approximately ten times.
This is a chatbot for Electric Cars repair guidance.
Should you perform this procedure on all four door handles?
Yes, you should perform this procedure on the other three door handles as well.
This is a chatbot for Electric Cars repair guidance.
What is burnishing the brakes?
Burnishing the brakes is a process of slowly decelerating the vehicle to eliminate high-pitched squealing noise while braking.
